fields.name: Copy_1_of_NCPTText
fields.fieldText: Please enter the Plan Approved and Plan End dates before logging activities.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_requiredText

screens.name: Copy_2_of_Required_Fields_Missing_Screen
screens.label: Copy 2 of Required Fields Missing Screen

fields.name: Contact_Required
fields.fieldText:
You must log that you have made outbound contact or received inbound contact before logging that you have held an appointment.


You may log that you have held an appointment when logging that you have made outbound contact or received inbound contact. To do so:

  • The Scheduled Appointment Date must be less than or equal to today's date AND
  • The Scheduled Appointment Date must be greater than or equal to the Activity Log date

fields.name: NCPTText
fields.fieldText: Please enter the Confirmed Plan Type before logging activities.

validationRule.errorMessage: Activity Date & Time must not be in the future.
Next Check-In Date must be in the future.

fields.name: NextScheduledCheckIn
fields.fieldText: The next scheduled check-in date must be at least 56 days before plan end date ({!Get_Case.BPS_Plan_End_Date__c}). Adjust the next check-in date to {!PlanEndMinus56} or an earlier date to continue.

fields.name: DeclarationText
fields.fieldText:
I have contacted all informal, community, mainstream or funded support providers who may be able to contact the participant. For example:

  • A support coordinator who may be able to facilitate contact
  • People with consent
  • Providers that the participant has received face-to-face supports from in the last month

fields.name: UTCText
fields.fieldText: You can only select 'UTC Complete in CRM' if 3 or more unsuccessful contact attempts have been made.
